title: Police arrest nine people in connection with smash-and-grab robbery
excerpt: Police say nine people, including a juvenile, were arrested in connection with a smash-and-grab robbery inside a Fort Worth grocery store. NBC 5â€™s Sophia Beausoleil reports investigators want to know if they group are tied to similar crimes across North Texas and Houston.
